name: tutorial
description: In this tutorial, I will show you how to build full-stack (Vue.js + Node.js + Express + MySQL) example with a CRUD Application. The back-end server uses Node.js + Express for REST APIs, front-end side is a Vue client with Vue Router and axios.
author: bezkoder - https://www.bezkoder.com/vue-js-node-js-express-mysql-crud-example/
